name: 8th International Conference on Bioscience & Engineering
content: 8th International Conference on Bioscience & Engineering (BIOENG 2024) May 11-12, 2024, Virtual Conference https://bioeng2024.org/index SCOPE 8th International Conference on Bioscience & Engineering (BIOENG 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications impacts and challenges of Bioscience and Engineering. The conference documents practical and theoretical results which make a fundamental contribution for the development of Bioscience and Engineering. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field. Authors are solicited to contribute to the Conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to. TOPICS OF INTEREST • Biochemical Engineering • Biochemical Genetics • Biochemistry • Bio-fermentation Technology • Bioinformatics • Biomedicine • Biomolecules • Biophysics • Bioscience Engineering • Biotechnology • Cancer Biology • Cell Membrane Recognition • Chromatin structure • Ecology, Evolution and Population Biology • Food Science & Technology • Genetics • Geo microbiology • Health Informatics • Mechanism of Antibiotic Resistance • Mechanism of Transcription and Translation • Medical Science • Microbiology • Molecular Biology of Plants • Molecular Biology • Molecular Chaperones • Nanotechnology for Medicine • Structural Biology • Wound Healing • Zoo physiology Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by May 04, 2024(Final Call). Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Bioinformatics & Biosciences (IJBB) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from BIOENG 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • Bioscience & Engineering: An International Journal (BIOEJ) • International Journal of Advances in Biology (IJAB) • International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES) IMPORTANT DATES • Submission Deadline : May 04, 2024(Final Call) • Authors Notification : May 09, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : May 10, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : bioeng@bioeng2024.org or bioeconf@yahoo.com Submission System : https://bioeng2024.org/submission/index.php For More Information Please Visit : https://bioeng2024.org/index
